alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:26PM EST until January 27 at 4:36PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Austell affecting Cobb and Douglas Counties. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Austell, Austell, Austell, Sweetwater Creek below Austell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek near Austell. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage near the Interstate 20 bridge. Portions of a paintball playing field just downstream of the bridge and athletic fields in the Woodrow Wilson Park on Mount Vernon Road are flooded with one to two feet of water. A portion of Wren Circle in Douglas County...the County Iron Works and Sunlight Drive in Cobb County begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM EST Friday was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 3.4 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.0 feet on 02/08/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 830 AM EST.
